my-insights.title: My INsights
my-insights.subtitle: Operational management platform
my-insights.description: The MyINsights Platform, also known as MyIN, aims to generate insights for the operational management of teams in the field, consolidating business data, device management, tickets and contracts in a single location, thus simplifying daily activities and increasing efficiency throughout the process.

features.title: Secure Authentication
features.description: Login page using next-auth for secure user authentication.

features.title: Intuitive Homepage
features.description: The homepage where all dashboards are shown for quick access.

features.title: Interactive Dashboards
features.description: Working integration with Power BI embedded reports for data visualization.

integratis-api.title: Integratis API
integratis-api.subtitle: Backend API for system integration and ETL automations
integratis-api.description: Integratis API is a RESTful API developed to integrate different systems and databases into a unified interface and to manage and execute ETL automations developed by the team. It is currently on its second version, with a more robust architecture and improved performance. Due to budget limitations, I've also developed a custom Storage Service to handle file uploads and downloads, which is used by other services in the company.

features.title: Swagger Documentation
features.description: Documentation auto generated using DTO classes and decorators.

features.title: Integrations and ETL Automations
features.description: Management of cron jobs to integrate and automate ETL python scripts.

features.title: Secure Authentication
features.description: Secured with NestJS AuthGuard and Public decorators.

vaske-admin.title: Vaske Admin
vaske-admin.subtitle: Administrative dashboard template
vaske-admin.description: Vaske Admin is a versatile admin dashboard template built with modern web technologies, designed to be easily customizable and feature-rich for various administrative needs. Its a project that I used mainly to learn and pratice React. It served as the basis for the development of MyINsights later.
